title: Pursuing personal interest through adult education
description: Pursuing personal interest through adult education
content:
Scenario: Pursuing personal interest through adult education
    Given Jordan loves art and wants to improve drawing skills
    And the community college offers accessible art classes
    When Jordan enrolls in the drawing class
    Then registration process uses accessible language and support
    And the instructor adapts teaching to Jordan's learning style
    And Jordan creates art alongside other adult students
    And Jordan's artistic expression is valued, not patronized
    And Jordan experiences being a lifelong learner
    And Jordan's creative contributions are celebrated authentically
